# [Girl Hackathon 2025](https://rsvp.withgoogle.com/events/girl-hackathon-2025/home)

[🔗 Link for Registration](https://rsvp.withgoogle.com/events/girl-hackathon-2025/home)

![Girl Hackathon](https://services.google.com/fh/files/events/girlhackathon.png)


✨ **Girl Hackathon 2025** is a program designed for women students in computer science and allied courses across India. This platform provides an opportunity to:
- Showcase your **coding skills** 💻
- Solve **real-time technical challenges** 🧠
- Engage creatively with **Google** 🌟
---
## **🎓 Student Eligibility**
To participate in the Girl Hackathon, students must meet the following criteria:
- **📚 Degree Requirements:** Bachelors, Masters, or Integrated Dual Degree in Engineering or related courses within computer science and allied branches.
- **🎓 Graduation Year:** Students from the following graduating batches are eligible: **2026, 2027, 2028, 2029**.
- **🏫 Institution:** Students must be enrolled in an engineering college in India and must be studying in the year as stated during registration.
- **📂 Course:** Students must belong to a circuit-majority course.
- **🌏 Nationality:** Students must be Indian nationals. Foreign nationals are not eligible.
- **📝 Registration:** Individual registrations only. Participants must enroll using their personal email credentials and provide their university email as a secondary contact.
- **👩‍💻 Program-Specific:** This is a **women-only** student program.
---
## **🗓️ Program Timelines**
- **Kick-off Call:** 🗓️ February 14, 2025 | 🕔 5:00 PM - 6:00 PM IST
- **Learning Cohorts:** 🗓️ February 15, 2025 | 🕙 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM IST
- **Online Challenge:** 🗓️ February 19, 2025 | 🕓 4:00 PM - 10:00 PM IST
- **Let’s Hack:** 🗓️ February 23, 2025 onwards
---
🌟 **Don’t miss this chance to showcase your innovation and talent in the engineering space!**
💡 Challenge yourself, learn, and connect with fellow women innovators! 🚀
